title: Rain armor
summaries: Rain armor or Rain set is an armor/Vanity items set that consists of the Rain Hat and the Rain Coat. It is armor on the [img:Desktop version] Desktop version, [img:Console version] Console version, [img:Mobile version] Mobile version, and [img:Legacy tModLoader version] Legacy tModLoader version. On the [img:Old-gen console version] Old-gen console version and Nintendo 3DS[img:Nintendo 3DS version] version, the set only act as vanity items, and offer no Defense when equipped.
Each piece has a 2.5*1/40 (2.5%) chance to be dropped by Rain Coat Zombies.
